column1: RAM#"2-18 MB on board (2 MB ""chip"" RAM and up to 16 MB additional RAM); Upgradable by further 128 MB via the CPU slot and 512 MB per Zorro III slot"
Video#24-bit color palette (16.8 Million colors) Up to 256 on-screen colors in indexed mode 262
column2: 144 on-screen colors in HAM-8 mode Resolutions from: 320×200 to 1280×400i (NTSC) 320×256 to 1280×512i (PAL) 640×480 (VGA)
column4: 1024×768i Horizontal scan rates of 15.60-31.44 kHz Vertical scan rates of 50–72 Hz

column1: Audio#4 × 8-bit PCM channels (2 stereo channels) 28–56 kHz maximum DMA sampling rate (dependent on video mode in use)
